docs.title: 🚀 illunare 4.0 Enterprise PlatformWelcome to illunare 4.0
docs.text:
Next-generation enterprise platform powering the future of business intelligence, AI/ML, and industrial connectivity

Get Started Architecture API Docs

docs.title: 🎯 Platform Overview
docs.text:
illunare 4.0 is a cutting-edge enterprise platform designed for the Brazilian, LATAM, and worldwide markets. Built with modern technologies and intelligent automation, it delivers unparalleled performance, security, and scalability for mission-critical business operations.

  • :fontawesome-solid-brain: AI/ML Intelligence

    Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and RAG models with DeepSeek and Ollama integration. Advanced fraud detection, biometric computing, and intelligent decision-making systems.

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: Explore AI Services

  • :fontawesome-solid-industry: Industrial Connectivity

    Profibus and Profinet RJ45 adapters for seamless industrial integration. Support for Arduino, Raspberry Pi, medical devices, and GeoGIS systems.

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: Industrial Solutions

  • :fontawesome-solid-car: Automotive Integration

    Comprehensive automotive industry features across all business areas. Vehicle compliance, transportation management, and supply chain optimization.

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: Automotive Features

  • :fontawesome-solid-shield-halved: Quantum-Ready Security

    Post-quantum cryptography, biometric verification, and zero-trust architecture. Advanced threat intelligence and anti-abuse protection.

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: Security Framework

docs.title: 🔥 Hot Reloading with Elixir
docs.text: Plug & play deployment architecture allowing production updates without service interruption. High-performance GCP compatibility with zero-downtime deployments.

docs.title: 📊 Advanced Analytics & Big Data
docs.text: ETL/ELT processing, cross-database synchronization, and quantum compression for storage cost reduction. Integrated with Muralha Paulista, Sistema Detecta, and Smart-Sampa.

docs.title: 🌍 Multi-Region Deployment
docs.text: GCP-based infrastructure with multi-region support, auto-scaling capabilities, and disaster recovery. Designed to handle 1M+ RPS with sub-millisecond response times.

docs.title: 🇧🇷 Brazilian Compliance
docs.text: Full compliance with LGPD, FenSeg, SUSEP, and E-Social regulations. Specialized services for Brazilian and LATAM market requirements.

docs.text:
graph TB
    %% Frontend Layer
    subgraph "Frontend Applications"
        AP[Admin Portal]
        MA[Mobile App]
        LP[Landing Page]
        EP[E-commerce Portal]
    end

    %% API Gateway Layer
    subgraph "API Gateway & Load Balancing"
        GW[API Gateway]
        LB[Load Balancer]
        CDN[CDN]
    end

    %% Microservices Layer
    subgraph "Core Services"
        AUTH[Auth Service]
        USER[User Service]
        NOTIF[Notification Service]
        TENANT[Tenant Registry]

    subgraph "AI/ML Services"
        AI[AI Decision Layer]
        ML[ML Infrastructure]
        FRAUD[Fraud Detection]
        CORTEX[Cortex AI]
    end

    subgraph "Data Services"
        DATA[Data Processing]
        STORAGE[Storage Service]
        DATOMIC[Datomic Service]
        QUANTUM[Quantum Compression]
    end

    subgraph "Integration Services"
        INDUSTRIAL[Industrial Connectivity]
        AUTOMOTIVE[Automotive Integration]
        GOV[Government APIs]
        PAYMENT[Payment Gateways]
    end

    %% Infrastructure Layer
    subgraph "Infrastructure"
        K8S[Kubernetes]
        GCP[Google Cloud Platform]
        TERRAFORM[Terraform IaC]
        MONITORING[Observability]
    end

    %% Data Layer
    subgraph "Data Storage"
        POSTGRES[(PostgreSQL)]
        REDIS[(Redis)]
        SPANNER[(Cloud Spanner)]
        STORAGE_BUCKET[(Cloud Storage)]
    end

    %% Connections
    AP --> GW
    MA --> GW
    LP --> GW
    EP --> GW

    GW --> LB
    LB --> AUTH
    LB --> USER
    LB --> AI
    LB --> DATA

    AUTH --> POSTGRES
    USER --> POSTGRES
    AI --> ML
    DATA --> DATOMIC

    K8S --> GCP
    TERRAFORM --> K8S
    MONITORING --> K8S

    style AP fill:#e1f5fe
    style MA fill:#e1f5fe

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Docker 20.10+
  • Kubernetes 1.25+
  • Terraform 1.5+
  • GCP Account with appropriate permissions
  • GitHub Token for repository access

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Local DevelopmentGCP DeploymentHot Reloading Setup 
# Clone the main repository
git clone https://github.com/illunare-40/docs-site.git
cd illunare-platform

# Install dependencies
./scripts/setup/install-dependencies.sh

# Configure environment
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your configuration

# Start local development
./scripts/development/start-local.sh

# Initialize Terraform
cd iac-terraform/environments/dev
terraform init

# Plan deployment
terraform plan -var-file="dev.tfvars"

# Deploy infrastructure
terraform apply -var-file="dev.tfvars"

# Deploy services
kubectl apply -k k8s-manifests/overlays/dev/

# Configure Elixir hot reloading
defmodule illunare.HotReload do
  use GenServer

  def start_link(_) do
    GenServer.start_link(__MODULE__, %{}, name: __MODULE__)
  end

  def reload_service(service_name) do
    GenServer.cast(__MODULE__, {:reload, service_name})
  end

  # Zero-downtime service updates
  def handle_cast({:reload, service}, state) do
    :ok = illunare.ServiceManager.hot_reload(service)
    {:noreply, state}
  end
end

docs.title: Verification
docs.text:
# Check system health
curl -X GET https://api.illunare.com/health

# Verify AI services
curl -X POST https://api.illunare.com/ai/analyze \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" \
  -d '{"input": "test data"}'

# Test industrial connectivity
curl -X GET https://api.illunare.com/industrial/profibus/status

docs.text: 169+ Microservices 15+ Programming Languages 1M+ RPS Capacity 99.99% Uptime SLA

docs.title: 🎨 Frontend Applications
docs.text:
Modern, responsive web and mobile applications with unified design system and multi-language support.

  • Admin Portal - Enterprise administration dashboard
  • Mobile App - Cross-platform mobile application
  • Landing Page - Marketing and public website
  • E-commerce Portal - B2B/B2C commerce platform

docs.title: 🤖 AI & Machine Learning
docs.text:
Advanced artificial intelligence and machine learning capabilities with proprietary models and algorithms.

  • AI Decision Layer - Intelligent decision-making engine
  • Security Guardian - AI-powered security monitoring
  • Fraud Detection - Neo4j-based fraud analysis
  • DeepSeek & Ollama - LLM integration services

docs.title: 🔐 Security Services
docs.text:
Enterprise-grade security with biometric authentication, post-quantum cryptography, and zero-trust architecture.

  • Authentication - Multi-factor authentication
  • Biometric Verification - Advanced biometric processing
  • Post-Quantum Crypto - Quantum-resistant encryption
  • Anti-Abuse Protection - Threat detection and prevention

docs.text:
🇧🇷 Brazil🌎 LATAM🌍 Worldwide

docs.text:
illunare 4.0 provides comprehensive industrial automation support:

graph LR

        PLC[Industrial PLCs]
    end

    subgraph "Applications"

        BIO[Bioinformatics]
        GIS[GeoGIS Systems]
        ENG[Engineering Tools]

    PROFIBUS --> ARDUINO
    PROFINET --> RPI
    ARDUINO --> MEDICAL
    RPI --> BIO
    PLC --> GIS

docs.title: REST API Endpoints
docs.text:
Base URL

All API endpoints are available at: https://api.illunare.com/v1/

AuthenticationAI ServicesIndustrial 
POST /auth/login
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "email": "user@company.com",
  "password": "secure_password",
  "mfa_token": "123456"
}

POST /ai/analyze
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs...
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "input_data": "business data to analyze",
  "model": "fraud_detection",
  "confidence_threshold": 0.85
}

GET /industrial/profibus/devices
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs...

Response:
{
  "devices": [
    {
      "id": "device_001",
      "type": "temperature_sensor",
      "status": "online",
      "last_reading": "23.5°C"
    }
  ]
}

docs.title: GraphQL Endpoint
docs.text:
query GetUserServices($userId: ID!) {
  user(id: $userId) {
    services {
      id
      name
      status
      healthCheck {
        uptime
        responseTime
        errorRate
      }
    }
  }
}
